p: A stirred solution of epoxide 39 (611 mg, 2.6 mmol) in dry EtOH (8 ml) was treated with an excess of iPrNH 2 (0.43 ml, 5 mmol) or t-BuNH 2 (0.52 ml, 5 mmol). The reaction mixture was stirred at 50 °C for 4 h, and then the solvent was evaporated. The crude was constituted principally by the amino alcohol 40 (iPr) or 41(tBu) and it was used in the next reaction step without further purification.
